name: Colour Bind (itch)
description:
Use the arrow keys to push blocks.
R to restart a level at the cost of a life
Q to go back to the title screen.
P to pause the game.

Work your way through all 20 levels by pushing blocks so that all blocks of the same colour are joined together.

Do not fall down holes or push blocks into them!

Dark blue blocks cannot be moved.

Only blocks of the same colour as a filter can be pushed across or onto it.

Time left is turned into points when a level is finished.

Colour Bind is copyright Mark Mainwood 2019.

Colour Bind was conceived, designed and originally programmed for the Commodore 64 by Mark Mainwood. You can get the original Colour Bind at Mark's website: http://javaexperiment.com/c64.htm

This remake has been created with permission.

Programming by Shane O'Brien.
Art by Clare Byrne.
